name: Five Elements (itch) (Shimin Sun)
description:
PRESS SPACE TO START

Roll the dice that represent five elements(Wuxing) from Daoism and Chinese Philosophy. Beat your opponent by having better combination of elements!

Five Elements:

Metal(Sword) -> Wood

Wood(Tree) ->Earth

Earth(Mountain) -> Water

Water -> Fire

Fire -> Metal

Credit:
